title.narrative: Production of thermal insulation material based on Typha

description.narrative: Lobjectif du projet est de faciliter le développement dune production locale de matériaux disolation thermique à base de Typha. Il vise à améliorer lefficacité énergétique dans les techniques de construction en milieu urbain, comme en milieu rural.
capital of a political entity

activity-description.narrative: Le projet de transfert de technologie a pour but principal de faciliter le développement dune production local des matériaux disolation thermique à base de TYPHA. description.narrative: Secured supply of quality typha raw material ensuring large scale sustainable investment in the local production of typhabased building materials
Number of companies involved in Typha large scale clean material harvesting by EOP

comment.narrative:
0
In collaboration with SEN environnement and KAITO the project is still in the feasibility studies since the first results have demonstrated that it will be too expensive to have a complete industrial unit for harvesting drying and processing the process cannot be considered without all necessary treatment until appropriate fibers In addition adequate machinery for harvesting at large scale and consistent with the standard are being identified

0
In collaboration with SEN environnement and KAITO the project is still in the feasibility studies since the first results have demonstrated that it will be too expensive to have a complete industrial unit for harvesting drying and processing the process cannot be considered without all necessary treatment until appropriate fibers In addition adequate machinery for harvesting at large scale and consistent with the standard are being identified
